original: Johansson, Otto Clarence, redaktionssekreterare, Linköping, f. 22/10/ 17 i Trollhättan av Otto J. o. Dagmar Fry kman. G. 44 m. Anna-Lis a Karls-■son. — Stud. v. in t. foikhögsk. i Helsingör 38. Journ. i Nya Älvsborgaren i Trollhättan 35-37, i Oskarshamns Nyheter 38, i Skaraborgaren i Fal-köp. 39-42, i Sydöstra Sv:es Dagbl. 42’-^, i Ny Tid i Gbg 44-47, red:sekr. i Ö’S:tgöten fr. 47.
translated: Johansson, Otto Clarence, editorial secretary, Linköping, born on October 22, 1917 in Trollhättan to Otto J. and Dagmar Frykman. Married in 1944 to Anna-Lisa Karlsson. Studied at the Folk High School in Helsingör in 1938. Worked as a journalist for Nya Älvsborgaren in Trollhättan from 1935-1937, Oskarshamns Nyheter in 1938, Skaraborgaren in Falköping from 1939-1942, Sydöstra Sv:es Dagblad from 1942 onwards, Ny Tid in Gothenburg from 1944-1947. Became the editorial secretary for Östergötland from 1947 onwards.
